name: RTCRtpReceiver.transport
description: The read-only transport property of an RTCRtpReceiver object provides the RTCDtlsTransport object used to interact with the underlying transport over which the receiver is exchanging Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) packets.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
